Package net.sourceforge.sqlunit.ant

The SQLUnit Ant Task.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ReporterElement Handles the nested <reporter> tag of SQLUnit Ant task.
ReporterElement.LogFormatAttribute Defines the valid values for logformat attribute.
SqlunitTask SqlunitTask is a custom ant task that accepts a testFile name and runs the SQLUnit test class with the given XML test script.
SyspropertyElement Sample placeholder for key-value pairs that will be set as System properties.
XSqlunitTask Extended SQLUnit task.
